segments.text: Have you noticed the Mexican restaurant on the other side of this street ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean the one with the yellow bricks ? But last time I saw it , it wasn ’ t really in business yet . I saw some people inside furnishing the rooms . Is it open now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , someone give me a pamphlet introducing the restaurant and its business hours when I passed by this morning . So , let ’ s have a try . My treat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great , I like the idea of trying some new food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good for you . Today we have more chances to try some new food because there are now many new form restaurants in our city coming from places all over the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Also some traditional Chinese food , like noodles and dumpling are marketed in modern ways with improved food quality . I heard this year , the government has imposed very stringent inspection on the hi-gene conditions restaurants and suppliers of food are also under tighter control . For sure all the customers will benefit from this .
segments.speaker: S2
